x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
A technology platform would make it faster and easier for communities to mobilize volunteers, ensuring that help reaches people in need more efficiently and equitably. Technology would reduce the reliance on larger organizations or paid services and allow community members to connect directly with each other. 

By tracking activities and outcomes, organizations could better understand community needs, measure impact, and plan resources more effectively.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: A volunteer coordination app that matches people in a community with requests for help—grocery deliveries for seniors, tutoring for students, home repairs for those in need—based on availability and location.
